languages.text:
All allies affected by {g|f:6285e5ba2a804e3d9df1dd5f7fa819f2}Word of the Emperor{/g} are healed for <u>(from {uip|HealMin|050815b9d2e947acb13b81072f9b7210} to {uip|HealMax|050815b9d2e947acb13b81072f9b7210})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.
! This {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} can only be used while there is at least one ally affected by {g|f:6285e5ba2a804e3d9df1dd5f7fa819f2}Word of the Emperor{/g}.
languages.original_text: Все союзники, на которых действует Слово Императора, восстанавливают (от {uip|HealMin|050815b9d2e947acb13b81072f9b7210} до {uip|HealMax|050815b9d2e947acb13b81072f9b7210}) {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}. ! Эту {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосилу{/g} можно использовать, если хотя бы на одного из союзников действует Слово Императора.

traits.locale_text: All allies affected by Word of the Emperor are healed for 1d10+(Psyker's psy rating)+(ally's resolve) wounds. ! This psychic power can only be used while there is at least one ally affected by Word of the Emperor.

All allies affected by Word of the Emperor are healed for (1d10 + psyker's psy rating + ally's resolve) wounds. ! This psychic power can only be used while there is at least one ally affected by Word of the Emperor.

All allies affected by Word of the Emperor are healed for (from {uip|HealMin|050815b9d2e947acb13b81072f9b7210} to {uip|HealMax|050815b9d2e947acb13b81072f9b7210}) {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. ! This {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} can only be used while there is at least one ally affected by Word of the Emperor.

All allies affected by Word of the Emperor are healed for {uip|HealMin|050815b9d2e947acb13b81072f9b7210}-{uip|HealMax|050815b9d2e947acb13b81072f9b7210} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. ! This psychic power can only be used while there is at least one ally affected by Word of the Emperor.

All allies affected by Word of the Emperor are healed for (from {uip|HealMin|050815b9d2e947acb13b81072f9b7210} to {uip|HealMax|050815b9d2e947acb13b81072f9b7210}) {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. ! This {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} can only be used while there is at least one ally affected by Word of the Emperor.

languages.text: Все союзники, на которых действует Слово Императора, восстанавливают (от {uip|HealMin|050815b9d2e947acb13b81072f9b7210} до {uip|HealMax|050815b9d2e947acb13b81072f9b7210}) {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}. ! Эту {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосилу{/g} можно использовать, если хотя бы на одного из союзников действует Слово Императора.
languages.original_text: All allies affected by Word of the Emperor are healed for (from {uip|HealMin|050815b9d2e947acb13b81072f9b7210} to {uip|HealMax|050815b9d2e947acb13b81072f9b7210}) {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. ! This {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} can only be used while there is at least one ally affected by Word of the Emperor.

traits.locale_text: Все союзники, на которых действует Слово Императора, восстанавливают ((от 1 до 10) + пси-рейтинг псайкера + решимость союзника) здоровья. ! Эту психосилу можно использовать, если хотя бы на одного из союзников действует Слово Императора.

Все союзники, на которых действует Слово Императора, восстанавливают ((от 1 до 10) + пси-рейтинг псайкера + решимость союзника) здоровья. ! Эту психосилу можно использовать, если хотя бы на одного из союзников действует Слово Императора.

Все союзники, на которых действует Слово Императора, восстанавливают {uip|HealMin|050815b9d2e947acb13b81072f9b7210}-{uip|HealMax|050815b9d2e947acb13b81072f9b7210} здоровья. ! Эту психосилу можно использовать, если хотя бы на одного из союзников действует Слово Императора.

languages.text:
所有受到{g|f:6285e5ba2a804e3d9df1dd5f7fa819f2}帝皇之语{/g}影响的盟友，都会恢复<u>{uip|HealMin|050815b9d2e947acb13b81072f9b7210}-{uip|HealMax|050815b9d2e947acb13b81072f9b7210}</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}。
！此{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}只能在至少有一名盟友受到{g|f:6285e5ba2a804e3d9df1dd5f7fa819f2}帝皇之语{/g}影响时使用。
languages.original_text:
All allies affected by {g|f:6285e5ba2a804e3d9df1dd5f7fa819f2}Word of the Emperor{/g} are healed for <u>(from {uip|HealMin|050815b9d2e947acb13b81072f9b7210} to {uip|HealMax|050815b9d2e947acb13b81072f9b7210})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.
! This {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} can only be used while there is at least one ally affected by {g|f:6285e5ba2a804e3d9df1dd5f7fa819f2}Word of the Emperor{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 所有受到帝皇之语影响的盟友，都会恢复{uip|HealMin|050815b9d2e947acb13b81072f9b7210}-{uip|HealMax|050815b9d2e947acb13b81072f9b7210}点{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}。 ！此{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}只能在至少有一名盟友受到帝皇之语影响时使用。
所有受到帝皇之语影响的盟友，都会恢复{uip|HealMin|050815b9d2e947acb13b81072f9b7210}-{uip|HealMax|050815b9d2e947acb13b81072f9b7210}点{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}。 ！此灵能力量只能在至少有一名盟友受到帝皇之语影响时使用。

languages.text:
Todos los aliados afectados por {g|f:6285e5ba2a804e3d9df1dd5f7fa819f2}Palabra del Emperador{/g} recuperan <u>(de {uip|HealMin|050815b9d2e947acb13b81072f9b7210} a {uip|HealMax|050815b9d2e947acb13b81072f9b7210})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g}.
! Este {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poder psíquico{/g} solo puede utilizarse mientras haya al menos un aliado afectado por {g|f:6285e5ba2a804e3d9df1dd5f7fa819f2}Palabra del Emperador{/g}.
languages.original_text:
All allies affected by {g|f:6285e5ba2a804e3d9df1dd5f7fa819f2}Word of the Emperor{/g} are healed for <u>(from {uip|HealMin|050815b9d2e947acb13b81072f9b7210} to {uip|HealMax|050815b9d2e947acb13b81072f9b7210})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.
! This {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} can only be used while there is at least one ally affected by {g|f:6285e5ba2a804e3d9df1dd5f7fa819f2}Word of the Emperor{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Todos los aliados afectados por Palabra del Emperador se curan (1d10 + factor psíquico del psíquico + {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}brío{/g} del aliado) {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g}. ! Este poder psíquico solo puede utilizarse mientras haya al menos un aliado afectado por Palabra del Emperador.

Todos los aliados afectados por Palabra del Emperador se curan {uip|HealMin|050815b9d2e947acb13b81072f9b7210}-{uip|HealMax|050815b9d2e947acb13b81072f9b7210} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g}. ! Este poder psíquico solo puede utilizarse mientras haya al menos un aliado afectado por Palabra del Emperador.

languages.text:
Alle von {g|f:6285e5ba2a804e3d9df1dd5f7fa819f2}Wort des Imperators{/g} beeinflussten Verbündeten werden <u>(von {uip|HealMin|050815b9d2e947acb13b81072f9b7210} bis {uip|HealMax|050815b9d2e947acb13b81072f9b7210})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} geheilt.
! Diese {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionische Kraft{/g} ist nur nutzbar, während mindestens ein Verbündeter von {g|f:6285e5ba2a804e3d9df1dd5f7fa819f2}Wort des Imperators{/g} beeinflusst wird.
languages.original_text:
All allies affected by {g|f:6285e5ba2a804e3d9df1dd5f7fa819f2}Word of the Emperor{/g} are healed for <u>(from {uip|HealMin|050815b9d2e947acb13b81072f9b7210} to {uip|HealMax|050815b9d2e947acb13b81072f9b7210})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.
! This {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} can only be used while there is at least one ally affected by {g|f:6285e5ba2a804e3d9df1dd5f7fa819f2}Word of the Emperor{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Alle von Wort des Imperators beeinflussten Verbündeten werden um (1d10 + Psioniker-Psi-Wert + Verbündeten-{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g}) {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} geheilt. ! Diese psionische Kraft ist nur so lange nutzbar, wie mindestens ein Verbündeter von Wort des Imperators beeinflusst wird.

Alle von Wort des Imperators beeinflussten Verbündeten werden um {uip|HealMin|050815b9d2e947acb13b81072f9b7210}-{uip|HealMax|050815b9d2e947acb13b81072f9b7210} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} geheilt. ! Diese psionische Kraft ist nur so lange nutzbar, wie mindestens ein Verbündeter von Wort des Imperators beeinflusst wird.

languages.text:
Tous les alliés affectés par {g|f:6285e5ba2a804e3d9df1dd5f7fa819f2}Parole de l'Empereur{/g} sont soignés à hauteur de <u>({uip|HealMin|050815b9d2e947acb13b81072f9b7210} à {uip|HealMax|050815b9d2e947acb13b81072f9b7210})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g}.
! Ce {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoir psychique{/g} ne peut être utilisé que lorsqu'au moins un allié est affecté par {g|f:6285e5ba2a804e3d9df1dd5f7fa819f2}Parole de l'Empereur{/g}.
languages.original_text:
All allies affected by {g|f:6285e5ba2a804e3d9df1dd5f7fa819f2}Word of the Emperor{/g} are healed for <u>(from {uip|HealMin|050815b9d2e947acb13b81072f9b7210} to {uip|HealMax|050815b9d2e947acb13b81072f9b7210})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.
! This {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} can only be used while there is at least one ally affected by {g|f:6285e5ba2a804e3d9df1dd5f7fa819f2}Word of the Emperor{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Tous les alliés affectés par Parole de l'Empereur sont soignés à hauteur de (1d10 + indice psy du psyker + {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g} de l'allié) {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g}. ! Ce pouvoir psychique ne peut être utilisé que lorsqu'au moins un allié est affecté par Parole de l'Empereur.

Tous les alliés affectés par Parole de l'Empereur sont soignés à hauteur de {uip|HealMin|050815b9d2e947acb13b81072f9b7210} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g}. ! Ce pouvoir psychique ne peut être utilisé que lorsqu'au moins un allié est affecté par Parole de l'Empereur.

languages.text: 皇帝の言葉の影響を受けたすべての仲間たちの傷が({uip|HealMin|050815b9d2e947acb13b81072f9b7210}～{uip|HealMax|050815b9d2e947acb13b81072f9b7210}){g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}回復{/g}する。 ！この{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}サイキック・パワー{/g}は、最低1人の仲間が皇帝の言葉の影響を受けていないと発動できない。
languages.original_text: All allies affected by Word of the Emperor are healed for (from {uip|HealMin|050815b9d2e947acb13b81072f9b7210} to {uip|HealMax|050815b9d2e947acb13b81072f9b7210}) {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. ! This {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} can only be used while there is at least one ally affected by Word of the Emperor.

traits.locale_text: 皇帝の言葉の影響を受けたすべての仲間たちの傷が({uip|HealMin|050815b9d2e947acb13b81072f9b7210}～{uip|HealMax|050815b9d2e947acb13b81072f9b7210}){g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}回復{/g}する。 ！この{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}サイキック・パワー{/g}は、最低1人の仲間が皇帝の言葉の影響を受けていないと発動できない。
皇帝の言葉の効果を受けているすべての味方は、{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}を{uip|HealMin|050815b9d2e947acb13b81072f9b7210}-{uip|HealMax|050815b9d2e947acb13b81072f9b7210}分回復する。 !この異能者の力は、1人以上の味方が皇帝の言葉の効果を受けている間のみ使用できる。

languages.text:
{g|f:6285e5ba2a804e3d9df1dd5f7fa819f2}İmparator'un Sözü{/g}'nden etkilenen tüm dost birimlerin <u>({uip|HealMin|050815b9d2e947acb13b81072f9b7210} ila {uip|HealMax|050815b9d2e947acb13b81072f9b7210})</u> kadar {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı tazelenir.
! Bu {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}ruhsezi gücü{/g}, {g|f:6285e5ba2a804e3d9df1dd5f7fa819f2}İmparator'un Sözü{/g}'nden etkilenen en az bir dost birim varsa kullanılabilir.
languages.original_text:
All allies affected by {g|f:6285e5ba2a804e3d9df1dd5f7fa819f2}Word of the Emperor{/g} are healed for <u>(from {uip|HealMin|050815b9d2e947acb13b81072f9b7210} to {uip|HealMax|050815b9d2e947acb13b81072f9b7210})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.
! This {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} can only be used while there is at least one ally affected by {g|f:6285e5ba2a804e3d9df1dd5f7fa819f2}Word of the Emperor{/g}.
